comments.content: So Papyrus wrote a letter to JC using Georgia? Somewhat uninspired choice don't you think.

\> An open letter to James Cameron from Papyrus

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020165247im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BB_4900.gif)

So many golden opportunities for a sick burn were missed.
